sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R ,M.* FROM ( SELECT T.RYID,T.RYXM,T.XB,T.SFZH,T.MZ,T.CSRQ,T.XJZD,T.JG,T.ZZZQK, T.SFZT,T.SFFA,T.SFPCDX,T.GLPCID,T.PCYY, TO_CHAR(P.FSSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FSSJ, P.CLZT, P.CJR, P.XPOINT, P.YPOINT FROM SM_YDJW_XLPC_RY T,SM_YDJW_XLPC_PC P WHERE T.GLPCID = P.PCID
T.RYXM LIKE '%'||#pcryvo.ryxm#||'%'
T.SFZH LIKE '%'||#pcryvo.sfzh#||'%'
T.SFZT = #pcryvo.sfzt#
T.SFFA = #pcryvo.sffa#
T.SFPCDX = #pcryvo.sfpcdx#
ORDER BY #order#)M WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE R > #begin#

SELECT COUNT(T.RYID) FROM SM_YDJW_XLPC_RY T,SM_YDJW_XLPC_PC P WHERE T.GLPCID = P.PCID
T.RYXM LIKE '%'||#pcryvo.ryxm#||'%'
T.SFZH LIKE '%'||#pcryvo.sfzh#||'%'
T.SFZT = #pcryvo.sfzt#
T.SFFA = #pcryvo.sffa#
T.SFPCDX = #pcryvo.sfpcdx#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R ,M.* FROM ( SELECT T.GZXXBH,TO_CHAR(T.KSSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') KSSJ,TO_CHAR(T.JSSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') JSSJ,T.XFFS,T.GZDD,T.GZDDMS,T.GZDDDM,T.ZBX,T.ZBY,T.XLMC, T.JYXM,T.JYBH,T.XJRS,T.STMJXM,T.STMJBH,T.BZ,T.DJR,T.DJSJ,T.DJDW,T.XGR,T.XGDW, T.XGSJ,T.XLDM, TO_CHAR(P.FSSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FSSJ, P.CLZT, P.CJR, P.XPOINT, P.YPOINT,P.PCID FROM SM_YDJW_XLPC_PCRW T,SM_YDJW_XLPC_PC P WHERE T.GZXXBH = P.GZXXBH
T.GZDD||T.XLMC LIKE '%$pcrwvo.gzdd$%'
ORDER BY #order#)M WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE R > #begin#

SELECT COUNT(T.GZXXBH) FROM SM_YDJW_XLPC_PCRW T,SM_YDJW_XLPC_PC P WHERE T.GZXXBH = P.GZXXBH
T.GZDD||T.XLMC LIKE '%$pcrwvo.gzdd$%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R ,M.* FROM ( SELECT T.CLID, T.SYRXM, T.SYRSFZH, T.CPHM, T.CLPP, T.GLPCID, T.PCYY, TO_CHAR(P.FSSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FSSJ, P.CLZT, P.CJR, P.XPOINT, P.YPOINT FROM YDJW.SM_YDJW_XLPC_CL T,SM_YDJW_XLPC_PC P WHERE T.GLPCID = P.PCID
T.SYRXM LIKE '%'||#pcclvo.syrxm#||'%'
T.SYRSFZH LIKE '%'||#pcclvo.syrsfzh#||'%'
T.CPHM LIKE '%'||#pcclvo.cphm#||'%'
T.PCYY LIKE '%'||#pcclvo.pcyy#||'%'
ORDER BY #order#)M WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE R > #begin#

SELECT COUNT(T.CLID) FROM SM_YDJW_XLPC_CL T,SM_YDJW_XLPC_PC P WHERE T.GLPCID = P.PCID
T.SYRXM LIKE '%'||#pcclvo.syrxm#||'%'
T.SYRSFZH LIKE '%'||#pcclvo.syrsfzh#||'%'
T.CPHM LIKE '%'||#pcclvo.cphm#||'%'
T.PCYY LIKE '%'||#pcclvo.pcyy#||'%'

SELECT T.RYID,T.RYXM,T.XB,T.SFZH,T.MZ,T.CSRQ,T.XJZD,T.JG,T.ZZZQK, T.SFZT,T.SFFA,T.SFPCDX,T.GLPCID,T.PCYY, TO_CHAR(P.FSSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FSSJ, P.CLZT, P.CJR, P.XPOINT, P.YPOINT FROM SM_YDJW_XLPC_RY T,SM_YDJW_XLPC_PC P WHERE T.GLPCID = P.PCID AND P.XPOINT IS NOT NULL AND P.YPOINT IS NOT NULL
P.PCID = #pcid#
T.RYXM = #ryxm#
T.SFZH = #sfzh#
TO_CHAR(P.FSSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #kssj#
TO_CHAR(P.FSSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #jssj#
ORDER BY P.FSSJ ASC

SELECT T.CLID, T.SYRXM, T.SYRSFZH, T.CPHM, T.CLPP, T.GLPCID, T.PCYY, TO_CHAR(P.FSSJ, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FSSJ, P.CLZT, P.CJR, P.XPOINT, P.YPOINT FROM YDJW.SM_YDJW_XLPC_CL T,SM_YDJW_XLPC_PC P WHERE T.GLPCID = P.PCID
P.PCID = #pcid#
